Test Plan:

    add r1, r0, #2 = 00000010100000000001000000000010
    add r0, r1, #4 = 00000010100000010000000000000100
    add r2, r0, r1 = 00000000100000000010000000000001
    cmp r0, r1 = 00000001010100000000000000000001
    sub r3, r2, r0 = 00000000010000100011000000000000
    bge #0 = 10101010000000000000000000000000
    sub r0, r0, #1 = 00000010010000000000000000000001
    sub r1, r1, #1 = 00000010010000010001000000000001
    sub r2, r2, #1 = 00000010010000100010000000000001
    sub r3, r3, #1 = 00000010010001100110000000000001
